attributes.action: Make bits and pieces the national anthem of Scotland
attributes.additional_details: Make yer self useful for once
attributes.background: Bits and pieces is a gem in Scotland so why not make it the national anthem

rejection.details:
National anthems are a matter of tradition, and adopting any national anthem for Scotland would be a matter for the Scottish Government, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can find out how to petition the Scottish Parliament here: https://www.parliament.scot/gettinginvolved/petitions/CreateAPetition.aspx
